verbs.description: After [ARGM-LOC: a series of] [ARGM-LOC: primary contests] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG1: loyalty to President Trump] [V: was] [ARG2: a clear litmus test to voters] , Republicans are reckoning with his transformation of the party .
